question: 尚且つ
sourceMnemonic: Someone keeps saying <kanji>furthermore</kanji> and <kanji>also</kanji> over and over again. Just when you think they've stopped, they turn around and say "<vocabulary>and yet</vocabulary>," before going back to repeating <vocabulary>furthermore</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>besides</vocabulary> again and again. It's driving you crazy.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
